prd.description: IPPAN Foundation website with forum functionality
objectives: Create a modern, responsive website for the IPPAN Foundation
Implement a forum system for community discussions

features.name: Homepage
features.description: Landing page with hero section, mission overview, and navigation
acceptance_criteria: Displays IPPAN Foundation branding
Shows mission statement and key information
Provides clear navigation to other sections
Responsive design for all devices

features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User registration, login, and session management
acceptance_criteria: Users can register with email and password
Users can login securely
Sessions are maintained across page loads
Users can logout safely

features.name: Forum System
features.description: Community discussion platform with categories, threads, and posts
acceptance_criteria: Forum categories are displayed and organized
Users can view threads within categories
Authenticated users can create new threads
Users can reply to threads with Markdown support
Thread content is properly formatted and displayed

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Administrative interface for content and user management
acceptance_criteria: Admin users can access dashboard
Admins can manage forum categories
Admins can moderate threads and posts
Admins can manage user roles
Access is restricted to authorized users

features.name: User Profiles
acceptance_criteria: Users can view their profile information
Profile displays user activity and posts
Users can update their profile details

features.name: Static Pages
features.description: About, Contact, and Legal information pages
acceptance_criteria: About page displays foundation information
Contact page provides contact details
Legal page shows terms and privacy policy

technical_requirements: Database uses PostgreSQL with Row Level Security
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

user_stories.story: As a visitor, I want to learn about the IPPAN Foundation so that I can understand its mission and purpose
acceptance_criteria: Can view homepage with clear mission statement
Can navigate to About page for detailed information
Can access Contact page for inquiries

user_stories.story: As a community member, I want to participate in forum discussions so that I can engage with the IPPAN community
acceptance_criteria: Can register for an account
Can login to access forum features
Can create new discussion threads
Can reply to existing threads
Can view and navigate forum categories

user_stories.story: As an admin, I want to moderate forum content so that I can maintain a healthy community environment
acceptance_criteria: Can access admin dashboard
Can delete inappropriate threads and posts
Can manage forum categories
Can change user roles and permissions
